data.message: Thank you FaceBook for this video!  Overall I find FaceBook to be friendly, informative, inspirational, motivational.....and so on.  It is a great way to keep in touch or reconnect with friends.  This particular video is a good example of why I like Facebook.  It is the kind of information video that I would recommend to people who "have no use for Facebook".   The Facebook community is very special worldwide!

replies.message: Thank you, Judi. We're so glad you're enjoying your Facebook experience. Thanks for being part of our community! -Abby
